scripts.docs: npm run docs:analyze && npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:copy-sources && npm run docs:index && npm run docs:demo
scripts.docs:copy-sources: cp -r bower_components ./build && mkdir build/vaadin-router && cp -r src theme demo vaadin-router.html index.html analysis.json build/vaadin-router
scripts.docs:index: cp polymer.json build && cd build && polymer build && mv build/es5-bundled ../docs
scripts.docs:demo: cp demo/polymer.json build && cd build && polymer build && mv build/es5-bundled/vaadin-router/demo ../docs/vaadin-router
